channel.title: Spawning Npcs?
channel.description:
how can i trigger using an item with an object to spawn an npc next to you,
i have the base code i just need to know how to add the npc spawning bit.
im basicly asking for the sendmessage equivalent for spawning npcs ;P[br][size=1]Posted on: May 02, 2007, 12:19:09 PM[/size][hr]anyone? =x

or you could add summonnpc void and just add in the code

SummonNewNpc(ID);

item.title: Spawning Npcs?
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

In case 192: add your coding… so heres an example

this would be in case 192:

[code] if (useItemID == 4151 && atObjectID == 1531)
{
server.npcHandler.newNPC(npcidhere, absX, absY+1, heightlevelhere, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 120, false);

                                                          }[/code]

the 4 0’s are its walking range… so if you dont want it to walk then dont change those numbers

the 1 , is its wlak type… i suggest leaving it at 1

120 is the npc’s health… change that to as you wish

and false means that the npc wont keep reaspawning after its been spawned once…

well i hope that helps a bit…

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning Npcs?
item.dc:creator: @d4rk_n0v4 d4rk n0v4
item.description:
@d4rk_n0v4 wrote:

uhm add this to your code

spawnANPC(NPCTOSPAWNID, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY);

hope it works

Read full topic
